name: Shoot 'em Up (But Don't Get Crazy)
description:
How to Play:

Move your ship around with the arrow keys.

Shoot enemies with the space bar, but do not destroy them. Instead, reduce them to only one HP to neutralize them.

Then, get close to the enemy ship, press and hold the shift button to activate your tractor beam and rescue hostages onboard.

————————

Made with love by Team AppCase:

Programming: Chris LaRose, Collin Styles, Daniel Chen, Gus Nguyen

Visuals: Abby Ko, Monica Hung

Audio: Anthony Agresta

Source code available at: https://github.com/cjlarose/1hp
